entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:46 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:46 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
